title: Bicycle and Pedestrian Data Collection Manual
text: Transportation Research Board > Blurbs > Bicycle and Pedestrian Data Collection Manual Text Size: Bicycle and Pedestrian Data Collection Manual http://www.dot.state.mn.us/research/TS/2015/201533.pdf 173132 Bicycle and Pedestrian Data Collection Manual The Minnesota Department of Transportation has released a report that summarizes the main elements of its bicycle and pedestrian data collection program that is designed to collect bicycle and pedestrian traffic counts throughout Minnesota.   9/4/2015
